biocontainers.name: mimodd
biocontainers.summary: Tools for mutation identification in model organism genomes

biotools.summary: Comprehensive software package for mapping-by-sequencing, i.e. for the mapping, identification and annotation of phenotypic mutations in model organisms from whole-genome sequencing (WGS) data.

bioschemas.name: MiModD
bioschemas.summary: Comprehensive software package for mapping-by-sequencing, i.e. for the mapping, identification and annotation of phenotypic mutations in model organisms from whole-genome sequencing (WGS) data.
